1.0.0.en: Initial release - Flow card to set Homey Alarm time.

1.0.1.en: Homey Community TopicId and linking to source and support.

1.1.0.en: Add: New card - Alarm NN minutes ahead of time

1.3.0.en: ADD: Action flow cards for Scheduler devices

1.5.0.en: Scheduler Device - Dynamic flow trigger. App rebranding.

1.5.1.en: FIX: Check user input for time format at setup

1.6.0.en: New condition card: Is scheduled in (minutes).

1.7.0.en: NEW: Conditions for today, tomorrow, this week and next week. FIX: Update homey-api to 1.10.18

1.8.0.en: BREAK: Deprecating Homey Alarms flow cards - use the included Scheduler device instead.

1.9.0.en: ADD: Trigger flow card - Scheduled time is in N minutes.

1.9.1.en: ADD: Date and Time values as sensors for next scheduled trigger

1.9.2.en: FIX: runOnce devices' capability update after run

1.9.4.en: Homey-API to 1.10.20 and Cron node-module to 2.3.0, which should increase stability.

1.9.5.en: FIX: Missing time input validation on Set scheduler time to flow card

2.0.0.en: BREAK: Removed Homey Alarm API access and the need to manage everything on your Homey.

2.0.1.en: Swap nextDates() function to nextDate() to prevent some unexpected crashes from cron library.

2.0.2.en: First release for 2.0 - Removes Homey-API and management of Homey Alarms

2.0.3.en: FIX: Catch promise rejects from createNotification.

2.0.4.en: More error handling in getNextScheduledTime() to handle https://github.com/kelektiv/node-cron/issues/467 related issues.

2.0.5.en: Try to catch errors from cron library related to https://github.com/kelektiv/node-cron/issues/467

2.1.0.en: ADD: Extended cron syntax for hours and minutes to support ranges.
